title: The Blessing Of A Closed Door (Stephen Chandler)
description: Some closed doors are obstacles — some are opportunities. In “The Blessing Of A Closed Door,” Stephen Chandler of Union Church challenges us to trust God‘s timing instead of focusing on our current frustrations.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Some closed doors are obstacles — some are opportunities. In “The Blessing Of A Closed Door,” Stephen Chandler of Union Church challenges us to trust God‘s timing instead of focusing on our current frustrations.
